title: "A real challenger" mission, 1/4
body:
So, i have completed the first missions like a week ago, maybe two, but i still dosent have any new missions.
Any ideas how to fix this?

replies.body: Week 2 missions are aimed to go live around noon of Oct 2.  In the meantime, you'll want to get the Worlds missions pass if you want to get to 3/4 until week 2.
There should be more missions coming out next week.
But shouldn't they be released on a weekly basis? Because i should have at least one new mission in that case...
